## Mariculture production 
Make dataset ready for analyses. 

```{r data}
akva<-read.table("Akvadataut.csv", header=TRUE, sep=";") #load data
akva<-na.omit(akva)# remove NAs
prod<-select(akva, Kname, Yrs, Knr2017, Total.Production, Knr2017, SustFoodProd)#subset variables  
head(prod)
```
